sentence: Liked the coffee and quick breakfast at Mean Mug
Easy walk to restaurants shopping entertainment Warehouse Row
The breakfast buffet was really solid and the front desk staff was helpful and welcoming
My stay included free breakfast their breakfast buffet was definitely a step up from most buffets
The bar and restaurant were fantastic
Nice bar restaurants and a fire pit sitting area
This hotel is walking distance to much of downtown and it is many dining choices
Beautiful and comfortable Hotel but somewhat of a walk from restaurants and attractions
Great food in restaurant
In room dining was OK
Self Parking is free but breakfast is not free
The pool table darts and shuffle board table are very hidden and not labeled we sat at the bar and still had no idea they were there
Later when we needed recommendations for dinner or directions the front desk staff were spot on in their recommendations
Did not have ANY type of breakfast available Will stay somewhere else on next visit
We went to the bistro for brunch and the clean dishes were dirty
Front desk sold me tickets not knowing there was not breakfast buffet that day
Would definitely come backBreakfast was pricey for the amount of fodCould offer a children ’s menu
Breakfast room service came in a to go bag
We noticed another server treating the one other person in the restaurant in about the same manner so I guess that is just how they do things

the cleaning lady walked in our room even though we said just a minute bc we were getting dressed the staff at the desk were not very friendly we went to the bar in the hotel Friday night and were over charged by 70 on drinks we did nt get but did nt notice it until the next morning so nothing could be done the phone had a short in the cord so when we would call the front desk they could only hear pieces of what we were saying or asking for
